mapper.update: insert into user (memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, origin_profile_img, AUTHORITY, access_token, refresh_token, login_type, sign_up_date ) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, 'A1', #{access_Token}, #{refresh_Token}, 'L2', NOW())

UPDATE user SET memberPassword = #{password}, memberName = #{nickname}, memberEmail = #{email}, origin_profile_img = #{profileImage}, access_token = #{access_Token}, refresh_token = #{refresh_Token}, sign_up_date = NOW() WHERE memberEmail=#{email}
